parameters.query: SELECT content FROM vibecheck_raw_content WHERE fetched_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' ORDER BY fetched_at DESC LIMIT 10

prompt.text:
You are the editor of 'vibecheck', an AI newsletter that empowers readers to feel informed and autonomous about AI developments.

Analyze these items and classify each into the newsletter structure. Be selective - only include genuinely interesting, actionable, or important content.

ITEMS TO ANALYZE:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.items.slice(0, 40)) }}

CLASSIFY INTO THESE SECTIONS:

1. BREAKING (ðŸ”¥) - Major announcements, product launches, significant updates from last 12 hours. Max 3 items.

2. TOP_STORIES (â­) - Highest quality/engagement content that everyone should know. Max 5 items.

3. CREATIVE_TOOLS (ðŸŽ¨) - Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, Runway, Suno, AI art/music/video. Max 4 items.

4. CODING_TOOLS (ðŸ’») - Cursor, Copilot, Claude Code, Windsurf, AI coding assistants, dev tools. Max 4 items.

5. WRITING_TOOLS (âœï¸) - ChatGPT, Claude, writing assistants, content generation. Max 4 items.

6. LIFE_PRODUCTIVITY (ðŸ§ ) - AI agents, automation, personal AI, life optimization, workflows. Max 4 items.

7. RESEARCH_FRONTIER (ðŸ”¬) - Papers, breakthroughs, model releases, technical advances, safety. Max 3 items.

8. COMMUNITY_PULSE (ðŸ’¬) - Hot debates, opinions, interesting discussions, sentiment. Max 3 items.

For each item, provide:
- section: one of the section names above
- title: cleaned up title (fix caps, remove [tags])
- summary: 1-2 sentence engaging summary that tells readers why they should care
- url: original URL
- source: where it came from
- priority: 1-10 (10 = must read)

Return ONLY valid JSON array, no markdown:
[{"section":"...","title":"...","summary":"...","url":"...","source":"...","priority":10}]

parameters.query: INSERT INTO vibecheck_digests (generated_at, sections, html) VALUES ('{{ $json.generated_at }}', '{{ JSON.stringify($json.sections).replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '{{ $json.html.replace(/'/g, "''") }}') RETURNING id
SELECT id, email, name, delivery_method, telegram_chat_id, discord_webhook, slack_webhook FROM vibecheck_users WHERE active = true

parameters.name: content
